ygData.subject: Re: Guk Tricks [WAS:Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:etc etc hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m not sure those were pulls.  There s a buggy wall somewhere on the dead side, where live side mobs can aggro on you. I ve seen three live side trains,
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 10 Feb 2000, joseph wrote:
>
> I know what you mean about the crazy pulls...
> Was in the Savant room last night (got a BEM yay!), and our group saw all
> manner of things run past us. Minos, huge clusters of frogs, and even an
> EE! I'm not to well versed on the layout of Lower yet (getting there tho!)
> but i believe it was the Cavalier group who was pulling. People like to

I'm not sure those were pulls. There's a buggy wall somewhere
on the dead side, where live side mobs can aggro on you.
I've seen three live side trains, mostly stuff from the elder
room, run into the savant/executioner/cavalier area. One
happened to a group I was in (I was leaving and saw it all run
past me, then I saw my group all die), and I assure you we
were not pulling from the live side.

A friend and I were working our way to the mino elder once
from the dead side. We were having a close but in-hand fight
against two frogs (I was charming one) in the hall before the
room leading to the mino elder. Somehow the elder aggroed on
me through the wall, and teleported on top of me. Things went
downhill quick from there.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
